abstracts.cdata!:
This brief states that the intense impact of earthquakes, hurricanes, floods and other hazardous events on the vulnerable communities throughout the world highlights the socio-natural character risk that such events entail. This brief is expected to contribute to the encouragement of the use of assessment methodologies in developing countries, in order to generate greater disaster risk awareness, based on technical and scientific guidance to enable the assessment
details of the threats, vulnerability and potential consequences.
